text:
Created attachment 33582
Error log

When Apache get OCSP decode error, it doesn't recover from it and returns "ERR_CONNECTION_CLOSED" since that. "SSLStaplingReturnResponderErrors off" doesn't help.

I'm attaching error log. Apache returned ERR_CONNECTION_CLOSED, until I restarted it after 6 AM.
